allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Update training data with detailed exercise categories and specifications

- Add LIFT, STRONG, UPPER, LOWER category labels to all exercises
- Add exercise prefixes \(A1, A2, B1, B2, B3, C1, C2, D1, D2\) for workout structure
- Include detailed specifications: rest times, intensity markers \(EMOM, FFE\), tempo \(AMRAP\)
- Update rep schemes with variations \(E/S, ranges, progressive sets\)
- Training 1: Jan/Mar/May/Jul/Sep/Nov
- Training 2: Feb/Apr/Jun/Aug/Oct/Dec

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
